modName: Subsurface Full Body Map for Coverwomen and UNP UNPB Bodies
summary:
I edited Bethesda's body sub surface map to replace dimon's UNP version to help eliminate the texture seam under different lighting conditions with mrLenski's Coverwomen face textures.

Might work (help) with other body / face textures.
descriptionHtml:
I edited Bethesda's body sub surface map to replace dimon's UNP version to help eliminate the texture seam under different lighting conditions with mrLenski's Coverwomen face textures.

Might work (help) with other body / face textures.

The pack consists of
femalehead_sk.dds
femalehands_1_sk.dds
femalebody_1_sk.dds
Install after Dimon's UNP texture and mrLenski's Coverwomen.

I've added a simple SK file that match Dimon's for Head, Hands and Body. Try this if the main file (more realistic) version didn't help.
Another, Simple SK file that is half as bright as Dimons's for Head, Hands and Body (close to main file level). Try this if the main file (more realistic) version didn't help, or the other look to shinny.

I was asked what I use.

For Body, I use Dimon's 1.2, then install on top of that Dimon's 1.5 HD texture and HD normal map.
For Face, I use mrLenski Coverwomen 3 then install on top of that the matching Coverwomen UNP 3 (its missing tint masks and eyebrows from the main file). It shouldn't matter which look of Coverwomen you use.

Released for Modder's Resource as well. No need to ask, just link back here for the credits.

Thanks to
Dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]

mrLenski
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563]Coverwomen[/url]

=================================
